job_title: Build AI-Powered Physical Therapy Assessment Platform
proposal_text:
I see you need an AI assessment platform for physical therapy clinics that analyzes patient movement videos and generates treatment plans. The 6-week deadline and your mention of "burned by an agency that promised the world" tells me you need proof, not promises.

We built TherapyKin (therapykin.ai) — an AI therapy companion with text + voice interaction, 121+ production deployments, and HIPAA-aware privacy practices. You can verify our work at github.com/nlr-ai (65K commits) and github.com/mind-protocol (includes terminal-velocity with 1.1k stars).

Milestone 1 delivers: (1) Video upload API with pose detection (MediaPipe or similar), (2) Movement analysis engine with AI assessment, (3) Treatment plan generator with editable templates, (4) Demo deployment with 3 test cases you can share with your pilot clinic. Tests verify: upload accepts MP4/MOV, analysis completes <10 seconds, treatment plans match clinical standards you provide.

What's the catch? You pay $8,500 only when tests pass. If scope changes, you choose: Swap (replace with equal complexity, no price change) or Add (new milestone, priced separately). This keeps you in control.

I can kick off within 48 hours. Which matters most for your pilot: speed of analysis or accuracy of assessment recommendations?

Nicolas
github.com/nlr-ai • github.com/mind-protocol
Available 14:00–19:00 Central for calls
questions: Which matters most for your pilot: speed of analysis or accuracy of assessment recommendations?
Do you have existing patient video samples I can use for testing?
